channel.description: Recent content in properties on htr3n's

item.title: Spring Boot properties issues with trailing whitespaces
item.description: __TL;DR:__Spring Boot does not trim off the trailing whitespaces in *.properties that in turn might lead to some unexpected errors. As the Spring development team decides to not fix this issue, we can configure code editors to avoid some similar problems.
